title: Use the Schema REST api for editing the schema file
description: [~sarowe] Stefan Matheis (steffkes) Marker for going forward with some kind of wizard for editing the schema.xml file.

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content:
I don't really see a burning need for some kind of schema wizard for straight Solr that uses the REST API, I think it's more likely that other tools will be using this capability.

We can create one if someone feels ambitious, but what we're about to have is good enough.
